ComicInfo.Summary:
Secrets from Henry's prison past are catching up with him. Crone is determined to take the Brotherhood in an insidious new direction. And he's going to make Henry a part of it, whether Henry wants to be or not. Meanwhile, Mrs. Perez seeks professional help for her problem with small furry things.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/exterminators-15-lies-of-our-fathers-chapter-three/4000-132071/

ComicInfo.Title: Lies of Our Fathers: Chapter Three
